    Description
    static final int
    DOUBLE_EXP_BIAS
    Double's exponent bias, that is the exponent of a double values falling within the range of 1.0d ... 1.999d (values with unbiased exponent = 0)
    static final long
    DOUBLE_EXP_MASK
    The bits of the exponent of a double represented as a long

    • hexStr

      public static String hexStr(double doubleValue)
      Returns a hexadecimal string representation of the given double value showing its sign, mantissa, and exponent separately, e.g. "-6_a09e_667f_3bcd e 3ff"
      Parameters:
      doubleValue - the value to convert to hexadecimal string
      Returns:
      the hexadecimal string representation of the given double value
